content:
Thank you so much! I appreciate your kind words and well wishes. I'm glad I could help you with your concerns, and I'm confident that you'll have a successful recovery from your knee surgery. Remember to take care of yourself and follow your doctor's instructions carefully.

It was a pleasure chatting with you, and I'm always here to help if you have any more questions or concerns in the future. Stay healthy and happy!

(And just a reminder, I'm an AI, so I don't actually have personal experiences or undergo surgeries, but I'm always happy to provide information and support to those who do!)
